subject: Invitation to Interview for Marketing Manager Role at NovaTech Inc.
body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your interest in the Marketing Manager position at NovaTech Inc. We were impressed with your background and would like to invite you to participate in an interview.

The interview is scheduled for Wednesday, March 20 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via Skype. You will be meeting with Ryan Thompson, Director of Marketing, who will walk you through the role and answer any questions you may have.

Please let us know if this date and time work for you, or feel free to suggest alternative availability.

Best regards,
Ava Lee
Recruiting Coordinator
NovaTech Inc.
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
